law.catch_line: Analyses Of Samples Of Alcoholic Beverages
law.text: [ Text of section effective until July 1, 2012. Repealed by 2012, 139, Sec. 107. See 2012, 139, Sec. 229.] The department shall analyze, in accordance with sections thirty-six to thirty-nine, inclusive, of chapter one hundred and thirty-eight, all samples of alcoholic beverages, as defined in section one of said chapter one hundred and thirty-eight, submitted to it for that purpose by the officers mentioned in said section thirty-six if satisfied that the analysis is to be used in enforcing the laws.
